DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics IMA-026 administer subcutaneously ( SC ) intravenously ( IV ) healthy adult .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman age 18 50 Body weight great equal 50 kilogram Nonsmoker few 10 cigarette per day No serious infection , i.e. , require hospitalization IV antibiotic , upper respiratory infection within 1 month dosing
